name: logseq-url-plus
description: Retreive metadata or API response of a valid URL; then format with various templates.
author: https://github.com/rlhk

scripts.dev: rm -fr ./dist ./out/* && yarn && mkdir ./dist &&  cp resources/* ./dist/ && npx shadow-cljs watch :plugin :test
scripts.release: rm -fr ./dist ./out/* && yarn && mkdir ./dist &&  cp resources/* ./dist/ && npx shadow-cljs release :plugin
